design_system.name: Schooltino AI Design System
design_system.description: A professional, clean, and AI-forward design system for a modern School ERP. Combines the reliability of academic institutions with the futuristic, fluid nature of AI agents.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm transition-all
buttons.tino_trigger: rounded-full p-4 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-purple-600 text-white shadow-lg hover:shadow-indigo-500/30 hover:scale-105 transition-all

cards.stat: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:border-indigo-100 transition-colors relative overflow-hidden
cards.feature: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-all group

inputs.default: h-10 rounded-lg border-slate-200 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 transition-all

visual_identity.orb_container: relative w-16 h-16 flex items-center justify-center
visual_identity.orb_core: w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-tr from-indigo-500 to-purple-500 blur-[2px]
visual_identity.orb_glow: absolute inset-0 rounded-full bg-indigo-400/30 blur-xl animate-pulse-slow
visual_identity.listening_state: Orb expands and contracts with audio input (simulated with CSS animation)
visual_identity.speaking_state: Orb pulses rapidly with brighter core

interaction.trigger: Floating Action Button (FAB) bottom-right or Top-Navbar Center

universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, tech-forward feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
All cards must have a subtle border (border-slate-100) and shadow-sm.
Primary buttons should always use the 'Tino Blue' gradient or solid color.
The AI interface must feel distinct from the rest of the ERP - use glassmorphism and glows to separate it.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA compliance).
Use 'lucide-react' icons with 1.5px stroke width for a refined look.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Create the 'TinoOrb' component using the visual identity guidelines.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Refactor the Sidebar to use the glassmorphism style.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Redesign the Dashboard using the Bento Grid layout.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Apply the new typography and button styles globally in index.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure the 'Tino AI' floating trigger is visible on all authenticated pages.
